sqlMap.select: SELECT attendanceId, TO_CHAR(submitDate, 'DD Mon YYYY HH24:MI:SS', 'nls_date_language = ENGLISH') as submitDate, employeeId, employeeName, imageLength, checkIn, checkOut, approvalStatus, readStatus FROM( SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM v_getApproval WHERE approvedBy = #empId# AND approvalStatus = 'Pending' UNION SELECT * FROM v_recentlyApproved WHERE userId = #empId#) ORDER BY 2 DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalNotification FROM( SELECT * FROM v_getApproval WHERE approvedBy = #empId# AND approvalStatus = 'Pending' UNION SELECT * FROM v_recentlyApproved WHERE userId = #empId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tr_attendance SET read_status = '2' WHERE attendance_id = #attendanceId#
